parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return number of items of listbox or combobox with id idc of topmost user [[dialog]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lbSize''' idc
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> '''lbSize''' control

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_size = [[lbSize]] 101;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_size = [[lbSize]] _control;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lbAdd]], [[lbClear]], [[lbColor]], [[lbCurSel]], [[lbData]], [[lbDelete]], [[lbIsSelected]], [[lbPicture]], [[lbSelection]], [[lbSetColor]], [[lbSetCurSel]], [[lbSetData]], [[lbSetPicture]], [[lbSetSelected]], [[lbSetTooltip]], [[lbSetValue]], [[lbSort]], [[lbSortByValue]], [[lbText]], [[lbValue]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted: Sep 10 2014</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]</dt>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
